summary: Diff adds a backend state migration that hard-sets admin credentials and wires migration into backend/main.mo, plus updates project_state.json. No frontend changes are shown, and the backend auth logic changes required by REQ-1 are not evidenced in the provided (truncated) backend/main.mo diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix backend admin authentication so that logging in with the configured admin credentials succeeds, trims inputs, compares email case-insensitively, traps with an invalid-credentials-classifiable message on mismatch, and does not require unlockBootstrapAdminPrivileges.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows adding a migration and importing it, but does not show any changes to authenticateAdminWithEmailPassword, isCallerAdmin, trimming/case-insensitive comparison, trap messages, or removal of any bootstrap/unlock dependency. The backend/main.mo content shown is largely unrelated type/state definitions and is truncated before any authentication functions.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure admin login UI shows the exact invalid-credentials message only for backend invalid-credential failures, and shows a generic error for other failures (preserving parseAdminAuthError behavior).
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend files were modified in the diff summary, so there is no evidence of any UI/error-handling adjustment.
evidence: <no frontend file changes shown in diff summary>

hallucinated_features.description: Added a state migration that unconditionally overwrites stored adminEmail/adminPassword to the configured values.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request is to fix authentication behavior; it does not explicitly request overwriting persisted credentials via migration. A migration is allowed only if required for a state upgrade, but the diff summary does not provide evidence that a state upgrade was necessary to satisfy the bugfix.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project_state.json with new_feature_requests entries and known_issues.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the requested backend/frontend functional changes; BuildRequest does not mention modifying project_state.json.
